metadata.name: Pearlescent Blackness
metadata.description:
The symbolism of the ancestral warrior. Encoded throughout our DNA is the prayer: the spiritual negotiation between one's heart, mind & soul that calls in our ancestors.

The Universal Guard and God.
The protector against the mob.
The tribal yell inside the wishing well.
The dreamy spell awakens the rebel.

Dreamglyph Pearls and promises.
Ancestral scars are inscribed across our faces.
The language of the Divine etched by Goddesses.
That is what we behold in one another's countenances.

Scarred and skewed, marred and maimed.
Enduring life's hardships are not in vain.
Beauty comes from living through pain.
Breathing through the injustices and strain.
Power and purpose pulse through each vein.

We are the spoken for, never broken more.
Herein lies behind our eyes the open door.
Diving deep into our soul's ocean and shore.
Is the message that guides us to Evermore.
Where there is no war, just the Divine's mystical lore.
The garden of God where life's goodness has an everlasting encore.
